description.p: The Character gains a Strength of 19 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 19 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 17 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 17 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 19 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 19 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on whichever is higher of the character's Dexterity or Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 15 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.

The Character gains a Strength of 15 if his or her score isn't already higher, and a +1 bonus to AC in hybrid or bear form (from natural armor). Attack and Damage rolls for the natural weapons are based on Strength.
The werebear can move at a speed of 40ft per turn and climb 30ft per turn in hybrid or bear form.

sheet.description: The werebear can move at a speed of 40ft per turn and climb 30ft per turn in hybrid or bear form.

description.p: The werebeast can move at a speed of 40ft per turn in beast form.

sheet.description: The werebest can move at a speed of 40ft per turn in beast form.

description.p: The Werebear can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its AC and Size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

sheet.description: The Werebear can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its AC and Size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

description.p: The Wereboar can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except as its AC remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

sheet.description: The Wereboar can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its AC remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

description.p: The Wererat can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except as its size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

sheet.description: The Wererat can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

description.p: The Weretiger can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except as its size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

sheet.description: The Weretiger can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its size remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

description.p: The Werewolf can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except as its AC remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

sheet.description: The Werewolf can use its action to Polymorph into a Hybrid form, Full Beast form, or its True form. Its statistics except its AC remain the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to it's true form if it dies.

description.p: The Werecreature has advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

sheet.description: The Werecreature has advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

description.p: The Werecreature has advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

sheet.description: The Werecreature has advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

description.p: In bear form the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form the werebear makes two Weapon attacks. In hybrid form the werebear can attack as a humanoid or a bear.

sheet.description: In bear form the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form the werebear makes two Weapon attacks. In hybrid form the werebear can attack as a humanoid or a bear.

description.p: The wereboar makes two attacks only one of which can be with its tusks.

sheet.description: The wereboar makes two attacks only one of which can be with its tusks.

description.p: The wererat makes two attacks only one of which can be a bite.

sheet.description: The wererat makes two attacks only one of which can be a bite.

description.p: In humanoid form the weretiger makes two weapon attacks. In hybrid form the weretiger can attack like a human or make two claw attacks.

sheet.description: In humanoid form the weretiger makes two weapon attacks. In hybrid form the weretiger can attack like a human or make two claw attacks.

description.p: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or weapon.

sheet.description: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or weapon.

description.p: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and hits it with its tusks in the same turn, the target takes an extra 2d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature it must succeed on a DC (8 + Strength Bonus + Profeciency Bonus) strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

sheet.description: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and hits it with its tusks in the same turn, the target takes an extra 2d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature it must succeed on a DC (8 + Strength Bonus + Profeciency Bonus) strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

element.name: Relentless (Recharges after a short or long rest)

description.p: If the wereboar takes 14 or less damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

sheet.description: If the wereboar takes 14 or less damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

description.p: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC (8 + Strength Bonus + Profeciency Bonus) strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

sheet.description: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC (8 + Strength Bonus + Profeciency Bonus) strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

description.p: If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC (8 + Constitution Modifier + Profeciency Bonus) Constitution Saving Throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.
If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC (8 + Constitution Modifier + Profeciency Bonus) Constitution Saving Throw or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.
If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC (8 + Constitution Modifier + Profeciency Bonus) Constitution Saving Throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.
If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC (8 + Constitution Modifier + Profeciency Bonus) Constitution Saving Throw or be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.
If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC (8 + Constitution Modifier + Profeciency Bonus) Constitution Saving Throw or be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.
